review.pros: Pros – 1. Good compensation, one of the best in industry2. Good work culture3. respect for individual4. TCS Brand name advantage
review.cons: Cons – 1. Highly Improper work allocation - some over worked and some leaving company coz there is no work2. Very poor employee empowerment3. Not good talent recognition
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – You just have to allocate work uniformly among the various offices. Mumbai is overworked while we in Gurgaon keep sitin idle waiting for work
